name: Intro
commands: This is the first tutorial map.|There's no enemies, this is to let new players learn the controls.|Players are told via cutscenes how to initially move.|Players will visit the houses and Villages to learn how to visit and seize maps|Along with other tips like how to open the options menu|How to change the controls if needed|Player ends the map by seizing the throne.
source:
speak;;This is the first tutorial map.|There's no enemies, this is to let new players learn the controls.|Players are told via cutscenes how to initially move.|Players will visit the houses and Villages to learn how to visit and seize maps|Along with other tips like how to open the options menu|How to change the controls if needed|Player ends the map by seizing the throne.
win_game
